original_text:
Flash Cash
La passione per i motori si sa, non conosce età. La Ainsworth ha deciso di celebrare questa passione con una slot adrenalina ma senza tanti fronzoli, con una gameplay di vecchia scuola e una grafica importante. Il gioco si ispira alle corse automobilistiche in stile Fast and Furious, con macchine tirate a lucido e motori graffianti. I rulli si trova all’interno dell’auto e tutte le impostazioni sono sistemate sul quadrante digitale, stupendo dal punto di vista grafico. Il comparto sonoro è ridotto al minimo, nessuna musica di sottofondo ma solo il suono dei rulli interrotto dalle accelerate e dalle frenate in curva.
Caratteristiche di Flash Cash
La Ainsworth per questa slot ha voluto imprimere un taglio tradizionale, senza aggiungere livelli o funzioni speciali, ma solo simboli regolari, oltre a Wild, Scatter e ad alcuni moltiplicatori per incrementare le vincite. Proprio per questo, la griglia è una classica 5×3, con massimo 30 linee di pagamento variabili, cioè potremo decidere noi quante attivarne. Naturalmente va da sé che un numero più alto di linee attive si traduce in maggiori probabilità di combinazioni vincenti. Tra l’altro le scommesse sono abbastanza contenute, visto che per ogni linea attiva si paga appena 0,01 €, anche se poi si può salire di livello raggiungendo i 100 € sempre per linea. Per chi volesse, è possibile attivare i giri automatici cliccando sul tasto + posto accanto allo start. In questo caso si aprirà una finestra con un cursore a scorrimento. Il numero massimo di giri automatici attivabili è 100 senza limiti di vincita o di perdita. La volatilità è media, si vince poco e spesso, mentre abbiamo trovato un RTP leggermente più basso della media, pari a 93,93%. È utile ricordare che comunque questo valore incide in minima parte sulle probabilità di vincita e solo a fronte di numerose giocate.
Simboli e funzionalità
In Flash Cash troviamo simboli tematici e non tematici. Questi ultimi , rappresentati dalle carte da gioco dal 10 all’asso, sono anche quelli che pagano meno di tutti. A seguire troviamo il casco, alla ruota, il contachilometri, la bandiera a scacchi con la bottiglia di champagne e la macchina da corsa. Il simbolo del dollaro è il nostro Wild, ha funzione di Jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter. Può comparire soltanto sui rulli 3, 4 e 5. Lo Scatter è rappresentato dalla coppa, se compare 3 volte in qualsiasi posizione regala ben 10 giri gratuiti. Durante i giri gratuiti, se il simbolo Wild appare sui rulli 2 o 4, tutti i simboli di questi rulli vengono trasformati in Wild. Inoltre, è possibile che appaia un rullo aggiuntivo su cui può trovarsi un moltiplicatore x2, x3, x5. Se durante i Free Spins compaiono 3 o più Scatter, allora verremo ricompensati con 5 ulteriori giri gratuiti.

raw_translation.response:
Get ready for the ride of your life with Flash Cash, the high-octane slot game from Ainsworth. This game is all about the thrill of the race, with sleek cars and screeching engines filling the reels. With a classic 5x3 grid and up to 30 variable paylines, this game keeps it simple and lets you focus on the excitement. The graphics are top-notch, with the reels sitting inside the car and the controls displayed on a digital dashboard. The sound is kept to a minimum, with just the sound of the reels spinning and the roar of the engine as you hit the gas. 

But don't let the straightforward gameplay fool you - there are still plenty of chances to win big. The regular symbols include classic card icons, but the themed symbols are where the real action is. Look out for symbols like helmets, tires, speedometers, checks, and, of course, the flashy race car. The dollar symbol is the all-important wild, which can replace any symbol except the scatter. The scatter is the trophy, and three of these symbols anywhere on the reels will activate 10 free spins. During these spins, any wilds on reels 2 or 4 will transform all other symbols on those reels into wilds as well. And if you're lucky enough to hit three or more scatters during the free spins, you'll earn an additional 5 free spins. 

With a medium volatility and an RTP of 93.93%, Flash Cash offers plenty of chances to win without breaking the bank. So buckle up, hit the gas, and get ready for a wild ride with Flash Cash.

message.content:
Get ready for the ride of your life with Flash Cash, the high-octane slot game from Ainsworth. This game is all about the thrill of the race, with sleek cars and screeching engines filling the reels. With a classic 5x3 grid and up to 30 variable paylines, this game keeps it simple and lets you focus on the excitement. The graphics are top-notch, with the reels sitting inside the car and the controls displayed on a digital dashboard. The sound is kept to a minimum, with just the sound of the reels spinning and the roar of the engine as you hit the gas. 

But don't let the straightforward gameplay fool you - there are still plenty of chances to win big. The regular symbols include classic card icons, but the themed symbols are where the real action is. Look out for symbols like helmets, tires, speedometers, checks, and, of course, the flashy race car. The dollar symbol is the all-important wild, which can replace any symbol except the scatter. The scatter is the trophy, and three of these symbols anywhere on the reels will activate 10 free spins. During these spins, any wilds on reels 2 or 4 will transform all other symbols on those reels into wilds as well. And if you're lucky enough to hit three or more scatters during the free spins, you'll earn an additional 5 free spins. 

With a medium volatility and an RTP of 93.93%, Flash Cash offers plenty of chances to win without breaking the bank. So buckle up, hit the gas, and get ready for a wild ride with Flash Cash.

raw_translation.response:
Flash Cash
The passion for motors, as we all know, knows no age. Ainsworth decided to celebrate this passion with an adrenaline-filled slot game, without any frills, featuring old-school gameplay and impressive graphics. The game is inspired by Fast and Furious-style car races, with shiny cars and roaring engines. The reels are located inside the car, and all the settings are on the digital display, making for a stunning visual experience. The sound is minimal, with no background music, just the sound of the reels interrupted by the sound of acceleration and braking in curves.

Features of Flash Cash
For this slot game, Ainsworth decided to go for a traditional style without adding levels or special functions, but only regular symbols, as well as Wild, Scatter, and some multipliers to increase winnings. This is why the grid is a classic 5x3, with a maximum of 30 variable paylines - we can choose how many to activate. Naturally, a higher number of active lines translates into a higher probability of winning combinations. Moreover, the bets are quite contained, as for each active line, we pay just €0.01 (although we can go up to €100 per line). For those who prefer, it is possible to activate automatic spins by clicking on the "+" button next to the start button. In this case, a window will open with a scrolling cursor. The maximum number of automatic spins that can be activated is 100 without any limit to winnings or losses. The volatility is medium, with little but frequent wins, while we found the RTP slightly lower than the average, at 93.93%. It is useful to remember that this value only slightly affects the probability of winning and only after numerous plays.

Symbols and features
In Flash Cash, we find both thematic and non-thematic symbols. The latter, represented by playing cards from 10 to Ace, are also the ones that pay the least. Next comes the helmet, the wheel, the speedometer, the checkered flag with the champagne bottle, and the race car. The dollar symbol is our Wild - it acts as a wildcard and replaces all symbols except Scatter. It can appear only on reels 3, 4, and 5. The Scatter is represented by a trophy - if it appears in any position three times, it gives us 10 free spins. During free spins, if the Wild symbol appears on reels 2 or 4, all symbols on these reels are transformed into Wilds. Moreover, an additional reel may appear, with a multiplier x2, x3, x5. If during the free spins, three or more Scatter symbols appear, we'll be rewarded with 5 additional free spins.

The volatility is medium, with little but frequent wins, while we found the RTP slightly lower than the average, at 93.93%. response.content: Flash Cash's betting options are quite flexible, with bets starting at €0.01 per active payline. Players can adjust their bets up to €100 per line. This flexibility allows both low and high rollers to enjoy the game without breaking the bank.

review_with_topics.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.

Below is a review for the slot game "Flash Cash".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay features (symbols, paylines, Wilds, Scatters, multipliers)
Volatility level
Betting options
Free spins and bonus features
RTP (Return to Player) percentage

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: Flash Cash
The passion for motors, as we all know, knows no age. Ainsworth decided to celebrate this passion with an adrenaline-filled slot game, without any frills, featuring old-school gameplay and impressive graphics. The game is inspired by Fast and Furious-style car races, with shiny cars and roaring engines. The reels are located inside the car, and all the settings are on the digital display, making for a stunning visual experience. The sound is minimal, with no background music, just the sound of the reels interrupted by the sound of acceleration and braking in curves.

Features of Flash Cash
For this slot game, Ainsworth decided to go for a traditional style without adding levels or special functions, but only regular symbols, as well as Wild, Scatter, and some multipliers to increase winnings. This is why the grid is a classic 5x3, with a maximum of 30 variable paylines - we can choose how many to activate. Naturally, a higher number of active lines translates into a higher probability of winning combinations. Moreover, the bets are quite contained, as for each active line, we pay just €0.01 (although we can go up to €100 per line). For those who prefer, it is possible to activate automatic spins by clicking on the "+" button next to the start button. In this case, a window will open with a scrolling cursor. The maximum number of automatic spins that can be activated is 100 without any limit to winnings or losses. The volatility is medium, with little but frequent wins, while we found the RTP slightly lower than the average, at 93.93%. It is useful to remember that this value only slightly affects the probability of winning and only after numerous plays.

Symbols and features
In Flash Cash, we find both thematic and non-thematic symbols. The latter, represented by playing cards from 10 to Ace, are also the ones that pay the least. Next comes the helmet, the wheel, the speedometer, the checkered flag with the champagne bottle, and the race car. The dollar symbol is our Wild - it acts as a wildcard and replaces all symbols except Scatter. It can appear only on reels 3, 4, and 5. The Scatter is represented by a trophy - if it appears in any position three times, it gives us 10 free spins. During free spins, if the Wild symbol appears on reels 2 or 4, all symbols on these reels are transformed into Wilds. Moreover, an additional reel may appear, with a multiplier x2, x3, x5. If during the free spins, three or more Scatter symbols appear, we'll be rewarded with 5 additional free spins.

response.headline: Get ready for a fast ride with Flash Cash!
response.content:
Are you a fan of the thrill and excitement of racing games? If so, then you're going to love Flash Cash – the adrenaline-filled casino slot game by Ainsworth that takes you on a fast ride like no other!

With its impressive graphics and old-school gameplay, Flash Cash celebrates the passion for motors and the joy of winning. The reels are packed with symbols of racing cars, drivers, and checkered flags, making it impossible not to feel the need for speed.

This game is for any casino player who loves their slot games with a bit of grit, a bit of danger, and a whole lot of fun. Get your engines ready and prepare yourself for an epic ride you won't forget anytime soon!

And don't forget to keep your eyes on those jackpots, because you never know when you'll hit the big time and be able to afford your very own luxury sports car!

response.headline: Symbols
response.content:
If you're tired of playing slot games with the same old boring symbols, Flash Cash has got you covered! The symbols in this game are a mix of both thematic and non-thematic symbols. The non-thematic symbols include playing cards from 10 to Ace, so if you're feeling lucky, go ahead and give them a try. But if you really want to hit the jackpot, you're going to have to rely on the thematic symbols.

Let's start with the helmet symbol. It's not just a protective headgear for the racers; it's also a symbol that can pay out significant rewards. And the speedometer symbol is not just a gauge for how fast you're going; it's also a symbol that can accelerate your winnings at an incredible pace. The checkered flag with the champagne bottle symbol is not just a victory flag; it's also a symbol that can toast to your good fortune and pour out some extra cash for you.

But the real star of the show is the race car symbol. It's not just a card on the reels; it's a symbol of speed, agility, and most importantly, money. And if you're lucky enough to hit the Wild symbol, represented by the dollar sign, it'll substitute for any other symbol to create a winning combination for you. So, fasten your seat belts and get ready for a wild ride with Flash Cash!

The game is inspired by Fast and Furious-style car races, with shiny cars and roaring engines. The reels are located inside the car, and all the settings are on the digital display, making for a stunning visual experience. The sound is minimal, with no background music, just the sound of the reels interrupted by the sound of acceleration and braking in curves.

Features of Flash Cash
For this slot game, Ainsworth decided to go for a traditional style without adding levels or special functions, but only regular symbols, as well as Wild, Scatter, and some multipliers to increase winnings. This is why the grid is a classic 5x3, with a maximum of 30 variable paylines - we can choose how many to activate. Naturally, a higher number of active lines translates into a higher probability of winning combinations. Moreover, the bets are quite contained, as for each active line, we pay just €0.01 (although we can go up to €100 per line). For those who prefer, it is possible to activate automatic spins by clicking on the "+" button next to the start button. In this case, a window will open with a scrolling cursor. The maximum number of automatic spins that can be activated is 100 without any limit to winnings or losses. The volatility is medium, with little but frequent wins, while we found the RTP slightly lower than the average, at 93.93%. It is useful to remember that this value only slightly affects the probability of winning and only after numerous plays.

Symbols and features
In Flash Cash, we find both thematic and non-thematic symbols. The latter, represented by playing cards from 10 to Ace, are also the ones that pay the least. Next comes the helmet, the wheel, the speedometer, the checkered flag with the champagne bottle, and the race car. The dollar symbol is our Wild - it acts as a wildcard and replaces all symbols except Scatter. It can appear only on reels 3, 4, and 5. The Scatter is represented by a trophy - if it appears in any position three times, it gives us 10 free spins. During free spins, if the Wild symbol appears on reels 2 or 4, all symbols on these reels are transformed into Wilds. Moreover, an additional reel may appear, with a multiplier x2, x3, x5. If during the free spins, three or more Scatter symbols appear, we'll be rewarded with 5 additional free spins.

faq.answer: The Wild symbol in Flash Cash acts as a wildcard and replaces all symbols except Scatter. It can appear only on reels 3, 4, and 5.
